title: TDD: Forced move rules - tests and implementation
description: Write tests for: must use both dice if possible, if only one can be used must use higher. Implement getRequiredMoves() to filter valid moves accordingly.

title: TDD: Write diceLogic tests
description: Write Jest tests for: rollDice() returns valid values 1-6, initializeDiceState() handles doubles (4 moves) vs normal (2 moves), useDie() removes correct die from remaining.

title: Enhance player info display
description: Add pip count display (sum of distances to bear off). Show checker count on board vs borne off. Visual turn indicator animation.

title: TDD: Write gameReducer tests
description: Write Jest tests for gameReducer: ROLL_DICE action, MOVE_CHECKER action (updates points, bar, borneOff), END_TURN action (switches player), NEW_GAME action, win detection.

title: Implement moveValidation.ts
description: Implement isValidMove() and helper functions: isBlocked(), calculateDistance(), canBearOff(), hasCheckersOnBar(). Pass all validation tests.

title: Create Board component
description: Build src/components/Board/. Layout 24 points in correct positions (12 top, 12 bottom). Position bar in center. Position bear-off areas. Use Tailwind for board background (bg-board).

title: TDD: Write moveValidation tests
description: Write Jest tests for isValidMove(): blocked points (2+ opponent checkers), bar entry requirement, movement distance matching die, bear-off only when all in home board, higher die bear-off rule.

title: Write comprehensive E2E test suite
description: Create Playwright tests: e2e/hitting.spec.ts (hit, bar, re-enter), e2e/bearing-off.spec.ts (bear off to win), e2e/edge-cases.spec.ts (no moves, forced moves, doubles).

title: Install and configure Tailwind CSS
description: Install tailwindcss, postcss, autoprefixer. Create tailwind.config.js with custom colors (board, point-light, point-dark, checker-white, checker-black, valid-move). Set up postcss.config.js and src/index.css with Tailwind directives.

title: TDD: Write moveCalculation tests
description: Write Jest tests for getValidMoves(): returns all valid moves from current state, handles bar entry priority, filters by available dice. Test mustUseBothDice() logic.

title: Implement moveCalculation.ts
description: Implement getValidMoves(), mustUseBothDice(), calculateDestination(), getUniqueDice(). Pass all move calculation tests.

title: Install and configure Playwright
description: Install @playwright/test. Create playwright.config.ts. Set up e2e/ directory structure.

title: Backgammon Game
description: Frontend-only 2-player hotseat backgammon game using React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS. Jest for unit tests, Playwright for E2E. TDD approach.

title: Create App component and main.tsx
description: Build src/components/App/. Assemble all components: GameControls, PlayerInfo (black), Board, PlayerInfo (white). Wrap in GameProvider. Create src/main.tsx entry point.

title: Implement auto turn-end
description: Automatically end turn when no valid moves remain. Show notification to player. Handle edge case where player is completely blocked.

title: Initialize Vite + React + TypeScript project
description: Run npm create vite@latest . -- --template react-ts. Set up basic project structure.

title: Create GameControls component
description: Build src/components/GameControls/. New Game button, Undo button (within turn). Wire to dispatch actions.

title: Implement diceLogic.ts
description: Implement rollDice(), initializeDiceState(), useDie() functions to pass all tests. Handle doubles giving 4 moves.

title: Create Bar component
description: Build src/components/Bar/. Display checkers on bar (separated by player). Allow selection when player has checkers on bar and it's their turn.

title: Phase 2: Complete Rules
description: Bar mechanics (hit detection, forced re-entry), bear-off (home board validation, exact/higher die rules), forced move rules (must use both dice if possible), auto turn-end. All TDD.

title: Add animations
description: Dice roll animation (tumbling effect). Checker movement animation (smooth slide). Use CSS transitions and/or Tailwind animate utilities. Keep animations snappy (<300ms).

title: Create BearOff component
description: Build src/components/BearOff/. Display borne-off checkers (stacked horizontally). Serve as drop/click target during bearing off. Show count.

title: Phase 3: Polish
description: Drag and drop for moving checkers, animations (dice roll, checker movement), game controls (undo, new game), player info display, full E2E test suite.

title: Create Checker component
description: Build src/components/Checker/. Render circular checker with player color (Tailwind: bg-checker-white or bg-checker-black). Handle click for selection, prepare for drag. Show selection state.

title: TDD: Bear-off rules - tests and implementation
description: Write tests for: can only bear off when all checkers in home board, exact die bear-off, higher die bear-off only when no checkers on higher points. Implement validateBearOff().

title: Create core type definitions (types.ts)
description: Define TypeScript types: Player, PointIndex, PointState, DieValue, DiceState, Move, GameState, GameAction. Foundation for all game logic.

title: Create Point component
description: Build src/components/Point/. Render triangular point (SVG or CSS triangle). Stack checkers (max 5 visible, then count). Handle click to select/move. Highlight valid destinations and selected state.

title: Create Dice component
description: Build src/components/Dice/. Display two dice with pip faces. Show which dice used (grayed out). Roll button when canRoll. Basic roll animation.

title: Enhance game controls
description: Improve Undo functionality (full turn undo). Add End Turn button for edge cases. Add game over modal with winner announcement and rematch option.

title: Write basic E2E test (Playwright)
description: Create e2e/game-flow.spec.ts. Test: page loads, can roll dice, can click to move checker, turn switches. Verify MVP functionality works end-to-end.

title: TDD: Bar mechanics - tests and implementation
description: Write tests for: hit detection (landing on single opponent), sending to bar, forced bar entry before other moves. Implement in moveValidation.ts and gameReducer.ts.

title: Implement drag and drop for checkers
description: Create useDragDrop hook. Enable dragging checkers to valid destinations. Visual feedback during drag (ghost checker, highlighted targets). Touch support for tablets.

title: Create game constants (constants.ts)
description: Define INITIAL_SETUP (15 checkers each in standard positions), CHECKERS_PER_PLAYER=15, POINTS_COUNT=24, and other game constants.

title: Install and configure Jest
description: Install jest, @types/jest, ts-jest, @testing-library/react, @testing-library/jest-dom. Create jest.config.js for TypeScript. Create src/setupTests.ts.

title: Phase 1: Foundation (MVP)
description: Project setup, core game logic with TDD, basic components, state management. MVP: Two players can take turns, roll dice, make valid moves, game detects winner.
close_reason: Phase 1 MVP complete: core game logic with TDD (64 tests), all components, working game flow, and E2E tests (7 tests). Build passing.

title: Implement gameReducer.ts
description: Implement gameReducer with actions: ROLL_DICE, MOVE_CHECKER, UNDO_MOVE, END_TURN, NEW_GAME. Handle state transitions, hit detection, win condition. Pass all reducer tests.

title: Create PlayerInfo component
description: Build src/components/PlayerInfo/. Display player name/color, turn indicator, borne-off count. Highlight current player.

title: Create GameContext provider
description: Create src/context/GameContext.tsx with GameProvider component using useReducer. Expose state, dispatch, validMoves, validDestinations via context. Create useGame() hook.
